DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate immunological efficacy safety GC3110B versus GCFLU Quadrivalent Inj . among healthy adult 18 60 year age .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety GC3110B Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Adults 18 60 year age randomly assign 1:1 ratio receive either GC3110B GCFLU Quadrivalent Inj .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult age 18 60 year Informed consent form sign date Able comply requirement study Known systemic hypersensitivity egg , chicken protein , vaccine component Personal history GuillainBarr√© syndrome Subjects severe chronic disease consider investigator ineligible study Subjects receive vaccination within 28 day enrollment schedule another vaccination study Immunocompromised subject immunodeficiency disease subject receive immunosuppressive immunomodulating therapy
